generator:
1 { topicOf(W, T) : topic(T) } 1 :- workshop(W).
1 { scheduled(W, R, Sl) : room(R), slot(Sl) } 1 :- workshop(W).

hard_constraints.description: Double-booking is a disaster, so no two workshops in the same room at the same time.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, R, Sl), scheduled(W2, R, Sl), W1 != W2.

hard_constraints.description: Each room has a capacity limit of two sessions total for the day, sanity check.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- room(R), N = #count { W, Sl : scheduled(W, R, Sl) }, N > 2.

hard_constraints.description: DevOps crew is strictly midday only, no exceptions.
Data workshops are banned from Room 3, probably because of the bad WiFi.
UI and Data workshops cannot happen at the same time, they'll just argue.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(W1, "UI"), topicOf(W2, "Data"), scheduled(W1, _, Sl), scheduled(W2, _, Sl).

hard_constraints.description: Gotta make sure at least one workshop for every topic actually exists.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topic(T), N = #count { W : topicOf(W, T) }, N = 0.

soft_constraints.description: Empty rooms are a waste of money, let's track the idle slots.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("idle_slot", R, Sl, 1) :- room(R), slot(Sl), not scheduled(_, R, Sl).

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, R, Sl : penalty("idle_slot", R, Sl, Cost) }.
